original_title: Leonard Maltin's Animation Favorites from the Film Board of Canada
overview: This compilation of 9 NFB animation films is presented by Leonard Maltin. Included in the collection are Begone Dull Care, The Cat Came Back, Log Driver's Waltz, Getting Started, The Street and more.
tagline: Leonard Maltin's Animation Favorites from the National Film Board of Canada
title: Leonard Maltin's Animation Favorites from the Film Board of Canada
